data.title: MUR - Mauritian Rupee rates, news, and tools
data.meta_description: Get Mauritian Rupee rates, news, and facts. Also available are services like cheap money transfers, a currency data API, and more.
data.text:
MUR - Mauritian Rupee

The Mauritian Rupee is the currency of Mauritius. Our currency rankings show that the most popular Mauritian Rupee exchange rate is the MUR to USD rate. The currency code for Rupees is MUR , and the currency symbol is â‚¨. Below, you'll find Mauritian Rupee rates and a currency converter.
